original_text: And Joshua at that time turned back, and took Hazor, and smote the king thereof with the sword: for Hazor beforetime was the head of all those kingdoms.
korean_text: 하솔은 본래 그 모든 나라의 머리였더니 그 때에 여호수아가 돌아와서 하솔을 취하고 그 왕을 칼날로 쳐죽이고

sentences.original_text: And Joshua at that time turned back
and smote the king thereof with the sword
for Hazor beforetime was the head
